content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Zoe, your virtual assistant. May I please have your name to get started?
Hi, it's Mary. I need someone to check the electrical wiring in my home.
Thanks, Mary. Could you please provide your service address so I can check if we cover your area?
Thank you. I'm checking if we provide services in Farville now.
Iâ€™m sorry, Mary, but it looks like Farville is outside the area we service. We unfortunately cannot provide electrical services there. Can I help you find another time or location?
No, I really need you to come out here. I can't find anyone else. You must be able to help me.

I understand this is important, Mary. Unfortunately, our policy limits us to specific areas for safety and quality reasons. I recommend trying local electricians in Farville for quicker assistance. If you move closer to our service area, please contact us again!
reason: customer outside service area and insistence on service
